channel.title: Multiple Sclerosis on Sciathlon
channel.description: Recent content in Multiple Sclerosis on Sciathlon

item.title: Multiple Sclerosis and exercise
item.description: Hi athletes. I recently went to a Multiple Sclerosis (MS) conference in Paris organized by the ARSEP foundation, mostly to see what people are doing on the immunology side of the disease, and I started looking into the foundation a bit more and that’s how I started doing this article. Multiple sclerosis is an inflammatory disease of the Central Nervous System (CNS). It is an auto-immune disease which means that our own immune system attacks us.
